caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee, v. KERRY N.

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (ICA NO. 30650; CR. NO. 04-1-2261)
opinion.attorneys: Keith S. Shigetomi, for petitioner/defendant-appellant on the application.
opinion.panel: By: RECKTENWALD, C.J., NAKAYAMA, ACOBA, DUFFY, and McKENNA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant Kerry N. Sanders' application for writ of certiorari, filed on September 25, 2011, is hereby rejected.Page 1
